pr_title: suggest list type columns for annotations with multiple values (PLFM-6013)

timeline.message: suggest list type columns for annotations with multiple values
regenerated hashCode(), equals() and toString() for ColumnAggregation

timeline.bodyText: optional might work better than illegal arg for getListType();
timeline.author: john-hill

replies.bodyText: Other parts of code is relying on it throwing an exception being thrown if unexpected usage of  conversion to list type occurs
replies.author: zimingd

timeline.bodyText:
max(json_lenght())
Need  a test that would show this returns the wrong value.
